statements: SELECT * FROM HealthInsuranceClaims WHERE claim_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM HealthInsuranceClaims WHERE policy_id = 12345;
SELECT claim_id, member_id, claim_amount FROM HealthInsuranceClaims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM HealthInsuranceClaims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT member_id, policy_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM HealthInsuranceClaims WHERE claim_date < '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM HealthInsuranceClaims WHERE claim_id = 123;
SELECT policy_id, claim_amount FROM HealthInsuranceClaims WHERE member_id = 456 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM HealthInsuranceClaims WHERE policy_id = 789;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_id FROM HealthInsuranceClaims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM HealthInsuranceClaims;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_holder_age FROM policy_holders;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_holder_age, policy_holder_gender FROM policy_holders WHERE policy_holder_age > 30;
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_holder_gender FROM policy_holders WHERE policy_holder_gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 AND policy_holder_id = 3 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_holder_age FROM policy_holders WHERE policy_holder_age > 30 ORDER BY policy_holder_age ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY claim_date ASC;

SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM policy_holders JOIN insurance_claims ON policy_holders.policy_holder_id = insurance_claims.policy_holder_id WHERE claim_amount < 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 AND policy_holder_id IN (SELECT policy_holder_id FROM policy_holders WHERE policy_holder_age >= 40) ORDER BY claim_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM health_insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE member_id = 100;
SELECT member_id, member_name, member_dob FROM member_details ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_providers WHERE provider_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM health_insurance_claims JOIN member_details ON health_insurance_claims.member_id = member_details.member_id WHERE member_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY claim_amount ASC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_contact FROM insurance_providers WHERE provider_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT member_id FROM health_insurance_claims) ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT * FROM health_insurance_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC, claim_date ASC;

SELECT member_name, member_dob, claim_amount FROM member_details JOIN health_insurance_claims ON member_details.member_id = health_insurance_claims.member_id WHERE claim_amount > 500 ORDER BY member_dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM HealthInsurancePolicy;
SELECT policy_id, member_id, policy_start_date FROM HealthInsurancePolicy ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claim WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Member WHERE member_age < 30 AND member_gender = 'Female';
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_location FROM Provider ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM HealthInsurancePolicy;
SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date FROM HealthInsurancePolicy WHERE policy_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT m.member_id, m.member_name, p.provider_name FROM Member m INNER JOIN Provider p ON m.member_id = p.provider_id;
SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_date, c.claim_amount, m.member_name FROM Claim c INNER JOIN Member m ON c.policy_id = m.member_id WHERE c.claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT p.provider_id, p.provider_name, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM Provider p INNER JOIN Claim c ON p.provider_id = c.provider_id GROUP BY p.provider_id ORDER BY total_claims DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim WHERE member_id = 1234;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM provider ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM member WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, gender FROM member WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM provider WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital';
SELECT * FROM diagnosis_code ORDER BY diagnosis_description ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
